scripts.build: echo "Static site - no build process needed" && exit 0
scripts.precheck: npm run lint:js && npm run check:functions
scripts.lint:js: echo 'üîç Checking for console.log...' && ! grep -r 'console\.log' js/*.js | grep -v 'analytics.js' | grep -v '//' || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Found console.log statements'
scripts.check:functions: echo '‚öôÔ∏è  Checking critical functions...' && grep -q 'initProjectFiltering' js/script.js && grep -q 'switchLanguage' js/translations.js && grep -q 'initHeroConversation' js/script.js && echo '‚úÖ All critical functions present' || (echo '‚ùå Missing critical functions' && exit 1)
scripts.predeploy: npm run precheck && npm run test:smoke
scripts.deploy:safe: npm run predeploy && npm run deploy
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser js/script.js js/analytics.js js/hero-whatsapp.js js/translations.js js/portfolio-offering.js -c -m --source-map -o dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && cat css/*.css components/*.css | npx postcss --use cssnano -o dist/css/bundle.min.css
scripts.minify: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
